page.title: 11Goring Primary School
page.content: Goring school starts at 8.55am and finishes at 3.15pm.We take a register assemble at the beginning of the day with the Headmaster.Maths is from work cards.We spend a lot of time wirting about topics and turning it into a book.Topics vary alot and cover all serts of areas of study,we made visits ad trips conected with the topic.We also do music with the B.B.C.Broadcast and lots of P.E. and games and swimming,we have our own leanar pool and and a seperte P.E.hall.We spend the same time on art and craft and produce many pantings,drawings and models.we have morning and dinner break, there is a playground and field and large climbing equipment.There are many clubs that the children may join,or may leave class to go for music lessons.
